Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Masipulin, mukumbu’in tataqu’an ca tataqu, tupa ca pancang tu “minduldula, masumsuma.”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Matacqait ata bazbaz tupa tu “miqumicang tataqu.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu masipul tudiip, taqu’an azam tataqu malasbunun masipul is paitasanpia.
In class, the teacher taught us the Bunun language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malavi azam is tataqu silisili bazbaz, tusasauc azam is paitasanpia.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madia’ sala ca pisqancaipunin zaku malasbunun a qalinga.
I have learned many Bunun languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Daqdaqanin azak munsipulan, daqdaqanin azak pisqanciap malasbunun, na isbazbazku patan’a tina.
I go to school every day, I learn the Bunun language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kaut ca ngaan naak.
My name is Kaut.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Kaut。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Abis ca ngaan it tama naak.
My dad’s name is Abis.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Abis。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ival ca nggan it tina naak.
My mother’s name is Ival.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Ival。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mac’an ca qamisan naak haip.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza tatini tuqasnanaz naak, tupa’un tu Batu, mac’an qan ta’a ca qamisan cia haip.
I have a brother, his name is Batu, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫Batu，他今年11歲。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maszang ca sipulan naam.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Asa azak it tuqasnanaz naak tusasauc.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Asa azak tunhapav, maca mul’uun, na muskun azam tatlumaq tunhapav.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Asa azak papacqal’ is kaviaz, na maqtu’ azam muskun tusasauc ciin tunhapav.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uva’az azak is Bunun.
I am an Bunun child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是布農族的小孩。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Iha’an Ququaz ca lumaq naak.
Our family lives in Ququaz.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在曲冰。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza azam hahima’ tatlumaq.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza azam tataau ka maitac’an.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Aluskunan azak tama, tina, tuqasnanaz ciin tuqasnau’az.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malaungkav hala ca tama naak, sasaipuk ca tama naak.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Makius ca tina naak, ising ca tina naak.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malasbunun ca tama pababazbaz zamun ca ilumaq.
My father speaks the ethnic language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maca mul’uun tanabal a mu’amin azam mun’acang.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak it tuqas naak madamus ciciuq.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mantan azak asa salas tatlumaq naam.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak tina munata’ kavivila’ haip.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Masanglav sala ca diqanin, nii’ tu maci’it, nii’ amin macaklu ca diqanin, makazhav sala ca hivhiv.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mal’anugqu’ azam is muut ma’us pang, savali’an azam is vali, maklang sala tan’aun.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mina’unin tu qani’an, mindangqac ca diqanin.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Macingav azak tina tu, makua ca diqanin cuna mindangqac.
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa ca tina tu, qaal na maiza ca luvluv.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uka’ is luhum tu sananvan, mintasal ca bintuqan.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Na mulumaqin azam amin.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kamicqang is daan tu na mulumaq, masisaupa bintuqan ca is’ang min’asaz.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願，

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ka’ang qa ca luvluv mindaduu maipa ti’, asang azak munata’ kavivila’.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ingalan is lumaq naam ca sipulan, daqdaqanin azak tan’anak munsipulan, tan’anak amin mulumaq.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Nii’ tu madaing ca sipulan naak, nii’ tu madia’ ca masisipul, mu’amin papanqal.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mu’amin ca masisipul mu’inun ha’an vangku, muskun pakamali’, muskun pababazbaz.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun amin zamun ca tataqu kavivila’, maitatlumaq ca sipulani’.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Daqdaqanin azam ma’asik, mu’amin siningzav is taququ’anin maqaisvaz.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza ca maqaisqais is taungkul, maiza ca ma’asik.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ma’asik azam amin ciki’ciki’ is sipulan, aminun paqusil pakadangaz ca kukuzaun, daqdaqanin maningzav sala ca sipulan.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mun’acang azak tantungu ha’an qudasnanaz takna.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Talbuntun azam nii’ tu pasaduu, mantan azak min’asaz cia.
We haven't seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Saduun zakun at qudas a, musuu’ paka’un zakun sikua, paquu’ zakun savil.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mantan madavuc ca sikua sincuaz it qudasnanaz, mantan macial kaunun.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mazima azak savil it qudasnanaz, macial amin quu’an.
I also like grandpa's tea, it's tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu tustusvalin, musku azak it qudasnau’az pitdia paitu qani’an.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malcikaupata’ ca sinhanat it qudasnau’az a paitu qani’an, maiza ca kaan, tulkuk, bahat, maiza amin ca qazuqazu’.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mina’unin is paitu qani’an a, munha’an azam pinsanglavan matinguc is sanglav.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madia’ sala ca siniza’ it qudasnau’az a hutan, taii’ ciin calu iscaiv zakun, na ispa’adas zakun mulumaq.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Pasumsum azak nai tu mudaan, taqu tu na muqna’ang tantungu nai’an ca ickuin.
I said goodbye to them and said I'd see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Adasun azam tataqu munha’an patismumuutan haip diqanin, iha’an azam ukumbu’an masindailaz mabaliv is kipu’.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mukumbu’in azam is patismumuutan a, tupa ca tataqu tu “luqai’ ca ha’an tantangaus, ivut ca ha’an hiku’, ananaka saduu.”
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34765/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mapising azak is ivut, daqat nii’ azak saduus ivutivut.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madia’ sala ca luqai’ sadu’anku, idaza’ a nais lukic kusbabai, saduu azak amin tucqu’ ikumbu’ is huqtung masabaq.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza ca cuu’, tancikis, ciin huqnavdaing iha’an patismumuutan, mii’ang azak qabas sinaduus tismumuut mangki’, sinaduun azak haip a manahip sala ca is’ang.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madia’ sala ca siniza’ inaak a qaningu, iscaiv it tamatina pasaduu nai.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Na muskun azak it tamatina maipa ti’ maca muqnin.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Iha’an inul’uan dii, muskun azak it tuqasnau’az muntaitu’ ha’an pantamaun naak tantungu.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪我的叔叔。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Minaha’an azam Taihuku’ tunlaihlihsapuz panha’an Taitu’.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kaca’anin Taitu’ a, ma’unting laihlih ca pantamaun naak munha’an ul’uanlaihlih anpasduu zamun.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，我的叔叔開車來車站接我們。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Nii’ tu daqvisan is ul’uanlaihlih ca lumaq it pantamaun naak, pudaan tukuc is laihlih a kaca’anin ta’.
The station is not far from my uncle's house, and it's just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離我叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza ca madaing sala ka sasaipukas sinaipuk ingalan lumaq it pantamaun naak, muskun azam tunpaqais munha’an sasaipukan.
There is a big ranch near my uncle's house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu ha’an sasaipukan, adasun azam pantamaun naak paka’un sidi ciin tancikis.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Sanavanin, muskun azam munmicqang’acang ma’un qaisang.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madia’ sala ca laihlih ha’an micqang’acang, daqat tunpaupuh azam maipata’.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Na mudaanin azam a, malulun tu munghav tanqa’iu’us bunun ca paupuh, daqat mu’hazin azam tunlaihlihqaungu’ mucuqais.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要回去的時候，發現摩托車被人偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kaha’anin azam Taihuku’ haip, niapang ti inku’ananin naupa ca paupuh kit pantamaun naak.
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don't know if my uncle's motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道我叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Iha’an Ququaz ca lumaq naam tu takiucang, masipulin a mulusqu munha’an Qabinaz, ua’ takaha’anin bukzav miqumic.
When we were young, our family lived in Qabinaz. After I started school, we moved to Puli and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在曲冰，上學以後，就搬到了埔里，一直在都市裡生活。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Masipulin is sipulandaing, masipulak is itu iniqumicas Bununcuku’ a sipulun, minqanciap tu maca Bununcuku’ ha’an Taivang ti’ a madia’ sala ca vaivivaivi ka iniqumican.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Daqat, iha’an haip qamisan tu tanabal dii, muskun azak it tuqasnanaz mun’acang macicingav is madadaingaz, asat maqanciap is inak’anak a iniqumican.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Punmavaau’unin qamisan ca madaingaz dii, uutu maupang is talnaqtungin a bunun saduu’an.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Pacingvan zaku ka cia tu ma’az ca qalinga qancaipun bazbaz, mantan a cia maqancia bazbaz is malasqai’ial, maqanciap amin bazbaz is malastauluu ciin malaspuut.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Japanese, as well as Atayal, Hokkien and Chinese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的日本話說得很流利，也會說國語和閩南話。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Macingavak cia ha maqanciapin tu, tauluu ca binanau’az cia, madia’ sala ca puut pacqalan ha’an kukuza’an cia, daqat madia’ ca qalingaz qancaipun cia bazbaz.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Chinese, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是漢人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu pacingavan zami tudiip a, palaqanciap ca madaingaz diis madia’ sala ka itu qabas palaciat qanup a taiklac.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Altupat nii’ tu aminun macqal tu tukukua ca sinbabazbaz, Uutu kuci’aun zami tingvatikic pinqaningu, na maqtu’ang sicqasun tan’a.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu takiucang azak nii’ang macqal is inak’anak a iniqumican, maz’av tukuc dii bununcuku’ ca siduq inaak amin.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tudiipin tu minmadia’in ca sinpacqalan, mina’is’ang maqanciap tu maca inakan inaak Bununi’ a mantan makanvaivi, maqtu’ang iskukuniv.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Bunun is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為布農族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Haip qani’an tu na minsanavan, na mulumaqin ca nauba’nanaz.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak it qudasnau’az munca’an icivaa’ mabaliv is tulkuk, palasanuc is mantan macial a paitu sanavan na ispaka’un nauba’nanaz.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Laqai’ azam is babalivansanglav a, madia’ sala ca macicial a sanglav ha’an balivansanglav.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mabaliv azam is sanglavkabuu’, tankaunu ciin tau’lacdangqac.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maca ingalan taimicia babalivas kukutdaqun tupa’ tu, “mantan madavuc ca unglai ciin qalup inaak, mabaliva tukuc!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mabaliv azam is unglai ciin qalup.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Laqai’ azam babalivas qasu’, tupa ca taimicia tu, “ma’az ca balivun su’u? masqa’ masimal amin ca tulkuk haip, taau saba cuii ca ta’a.”
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tan’aun qudasnau’az tu mantan maqlic sala, ua’ macingav is taimicia tu maqtu’ang naupa vanaqan tukuc.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu tupa ca taimicia tu naut nii’in dangpia ta’ cuii, nii’in maqtu’ vanaqan.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Bazbaz ca ingalan a taimicia tu, nuqan mabaliv is kaan inaak i’, mamasqa’ ca kaan naak nii’ amin tu maqlic.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mabalivin azam is tulkuk ciin kaan tu hiku’in, mulumaq mahanat is tatpangka’ a ququul.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malabuntu matatala ha, mindumdumin ca diqanin.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Katingva’ ca nauba’nanaz mulumaq taqu tu, minkava’ nii’ tu maqtu’pul’uun ca malalasti’, maca ha’anin muqnin inul’uan na mulumaqin.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa kat qudasnau’az tu na palcikaupata’in is sinpitdia ki’ a, amini luklac ca mangka’ na muskun ma’un!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Luklac azam is kitlumaq, kaviaz, uskunan ma’us mantan macial sala kau’un a paitu sanavan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza tatini ka tukuzaku, malabuntu ka cia minpungul is mama’az.
I have a classmate named Qanciaz, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學，他常常忘記帶東西。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tudiip maca masipul, simul a cia ispapatas, isqaqaisqais cina papatasan ha’an tukucia.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maca muc’anang, mupusan, muti’un a, na pasilulanang is duma’ a cia mama’az.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu, maiza ca madikla’a talmaupa’an cia, malabuntu sisimul is mama’az a nii’ tu macuqais.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ihiku’in a nii’in ca duma’ asa pasimul cia mama’az.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza tatdiqanin, muskun azam mudadaan kavivila’.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Panmicqang is daan a, si’a’auma kat Qanciaz, uutu minpungul a cia madas is haqailqaisqais.
On the way, Qanciaz wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Qanciaz想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Makus’aiv a cia haqailqaisqais ha’an tukucia, uutu mu’amin ca duma’ antalam tupa tu, nii’ azam amin madas.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tangic at Qanciaz dii nii’in maqanciap tu na masikua. Mahau’ a cia tupa tu, makua amuu cuna mu’amin nii’ tu pasimul zakun is haqailqaisqais!
Qanciaz burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Qanciaz不知所措就哭了出來。他生氣的說，為什麼你們都不借我衛生紙!

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Taqu’an tukucia kat cia tu, nii’ asuu anak’anak andas’andas, maupa amin tu, na ispasimul su’un ca mama’az a, nii’ asu lungulungu macuqais!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muqnin masipul tu lakbingin, kantingmut sala kat Qanciaz munsipulan, aminun Qanciaz ca sinimul cia ka mama’az macuqais iscaiv is tukucia.
The next day at school, Qanciaz arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Qanciaz很早就到學校了，Qanciaz把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Sumsumun Qanciaz ca tukucia, tupa amin tu na anak’anakin a cia madas is mama’az, masumsum amin is tukucia dii mina’is’ang pasimul cias mama’az tu tangausang.
Qanciaz apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Qanciaz向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Numu’ malkaqanup at tama naak ha’an acang.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uutu uva’azang azak, na sanavan at tama ciin pantamaun munata’, madas is viia’ ciin bucul.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uuca mincingqalin ca diqanin, na madas a nai pinanaq a mama’az mucuqais.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mintung ciat vanis, mintung ciat haval, na mintun maiza amin ca linas.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Iha’an a nai acang picial pavaz is sinpapanak, sisulavis duma’ a bunun.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malabuntu azak pinqalisual it tama, na asat malavi tama tinqanup.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa kat tama tu, maca taldaingin azak ka na dasun cia azak muskun maipata’.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maqanciap amin makuhaqu madamus tismumuut ca taka’acang a bananaz, maqanciap a nai matas’is haquduun ciin malaqatu’.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mantan at tama naak maqanciap matas’is haquduun, tupa kat tama tu, isdamus linas ca dii, asat macqas saduu dapan is mama’az, na picanun daan laqaibas mama’azi’ ca haqu.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tis’unin na mahiav muskun is madadaingaz tinqanup, daqdaqanin azak pisqanciap mahaqu, tuza’ tu maqtu’ madamus mama’az ca haqu naak.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Saduu’an tama naak a tupa zakun tu, na zaku dau qabasin ca mantan matamasaz a malaqanup tu bunun.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說，我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Taldaingin azak haip, ama’un zaku ca inaak a buculkaka ciin kuus, malavit tama muskun tinqanup.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Matu mucuqaisin a nai mun’acang a isulavis duma’ taka’acang bunun ca sinpapanaq a mama’az.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa kat tama tu, asat masumsumtas maitangusin a madadaingaz macaiv is bahi’, maqtu’ang pasiza’un itun ca malcikaupa ta’ a mama’az.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Sihalacan azak munha’an sipulan tu tingmut.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Minpungul azak madas kavang tu, munha’an sipulan.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Nii’ azak madas lungulungu mama’az.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak tukuzaku saduu haqailsipulun tu, masipul.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Pasimulan azak tukuzaku ispapatas ciin isqaqaisqais tu, patanam.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Bazbaz zakun ca tataqu tu, “tingmuta mindangkaz ca muqnin, ka’in tu sihalacan!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kaviaz daingaz inaak tupa’un tu Tanpilic, Uva’az amin a cias Bunun.
My good friend’s name is Tanpilic, and he is also an Bunun child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Tanpilic，他也是布農族的小孩。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azam iha’an Ququaz masipul.
We study together in the Ququaz tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在曲冰部落讀書。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malucbut azam muskun tan’as madadaingaz bazbaz is qaiqabasan tu qalinga, mu’amin azam maqanciap malasbunun.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Bunun proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說布農語。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Malaungkav azak a masmuq amin, maputis at Tanpilic a makuis amin.
I am tall and overweight, while Tanpilic is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Tanpilic很矮也很瘦。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mina’ia’ang sala kat Tanpilic ca mankama’az, asaun salas duma’ a miniqumic.
Tanpilic is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Tanpilic很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Kavivila’ paluntan ca sipulan haip diqanin, madia’ sala ca sinkanal is sipulan a paluntanun.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maiza ca pasibutbut, katundaqmali’, malilia, iungi’ ciin manaq buculkaka.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Paluntan azak malilia.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Laplaq azak tu malilia tudiip, milu’lu’ ca qaa’, madia’ sala ca tiquc.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Qaltu mindangkaz azak muqnang malilia.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來繼續跑。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Pandiipin azak a mu’amin ca bunun manahip sala.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Qaltu nii’ tu lavai’, uutu mantan azak manahip sala, maupa’i saunaqtungan zaku ca paluntan dii.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak tama tantungu ha’an pantamaun naak takna.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Milu’lu’ ca bantac it pantamaun naak.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我叔叔的腳受傷了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Taqu’an cia azam tu mutuszuq ca tatavis lumaq.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Minaca’an a cia tatavi muqalqal tu sikangna ka cias tatavi.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Madas at tamas qasu’qanvang ciin saviki’ iscaiv it pantamaun naak.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給我的叔叔。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskun azak it pantamaun naak iha’an sabaqan pababazbaz, taqu ka cia madia’ sala ka qaiqabasan tu qalinga.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和我的叔叔在房間裡聊天，他講了很多故事。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tantangaus is na mudaanak, matumacqaing zakun at pantamaun tu taldaingin, mintalminduu amin.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa azak tu, “Tamanama’, mul’uang maca mincialin ca bantac, na munca’an amin lumaq naam kavivila’ ca ickuinin.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34765/5: 我說：「等叔叔（Nama’）腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Iha’an 2022 qamisan, mun’anpuk ca sasbinaz palaqanciap is itu Bununcuku’i’ a cibunsiu’ tu maqtu’ hazun palasbununun papatas is ngaan.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maicingavak is mintalminduu ka bunun inita acang Nasing Balincinan, punpipiin pundaza’ is paitasan na asa dau hazun palasbununun papatas ca ngaan ha’an cibunsiu’.
I interviewed Nasing Balincinan, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年人Nasing Balincinan。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Patataqun azak icia tu na munha’an lumaq cia tantungu maca ha’an inul’uan dii.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Ha’an sinpacingav dii ha, papacqal zakun a cia tu mina’ica ca ngaan icia dii, madas amin zakun papacqal is kitlumaq icia, acang icia.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Pacingavun zaku tu mazang siqucal tuza’ pahuvaiv is ngaan, nii’ tu macial ca maupa qabas a’ papatas?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa ka cia zakun tu, maupa’i maca malastauluu papatas a, nii’ tu mamantu ca sinpatungaan a qaquang cia, mintun amin ca duma’ bunun luklac cia tu “那先生”, Daqat mupiin paqainanan salas duma’.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Na Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34765/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「那先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Tupa kat Nasing tu, “ciat malasbunun papatas is ngaan ca nanu’ ngaan inita’, maca ngaan inita’ i’ a nanu’ sinpasnava’ is siduq nita’, kitlumaq inita’, ainakan nita’ ti cima, min’asaz tu katnuang minmadia’ ca Bununi’ mucuqais kilim is inak’anak a ngaan.”
Nasing said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34765/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Nasing說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Muskunak qudasnau’az takna munca’an pu’inunas isbabaliv malkaciat langqa’babalivan, madas at qudasnau’az is inak’anak cia sincuaz a sanglavsanglav, matas’i ka cia amin is itu Bununcuku’ kakaunun na balivus miniqumic.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食買給大家。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Asaun salas bunun ca langqa’babalivan it qudasnau’az, madia’ sala ca bunun mabaliv is daqpuut ciin pa’ic, madia’ sala ca bunun tanam ma’us sinhanat icia ka ququul.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mantan macial sala kaunun ca sinhanat icia ka li’li’ ciin dulazqaising, maiza amin ca kuci’aun maqav sinpisumal a qasu’vanis, madia’ sala ca bunun kaidaas tahun cia, mu’amin ca bunun munha’an langqa’babalivan icia masinlautu.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Uuca mahanat ca qudasnau’az is mama’az a, na ingalanak malkaciat taitungu, ingalanak sidaing is qalinga luklac tu, “mu’amin inak’anak sincuaz ca sanglavsanglav, nii’ tu punda’as iuu’, haiva maipa dii mabaliv.”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34765/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Mahiav sala ca mama’az naam aminun isbaliv, tupa ka qudasnau’az tu, “ala nii’ang it maizakas ha’an ti’ kadangazi’.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Maca sinkukuza dii ha, uqancaipanak is itu Bununcuku’ a taiklac is mutmuut ciin kakaunun, tan’a amin sinangu’an is malkaciat langqa’babalivan mangki’.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

Iha’an azak pitu’ tatnulan munha’an sipu: Saduu qudasnau’az tu mantan asa salas nanu’ talmaupa’an a kakaunun, kanaha’an azak is is’ang tan’a tu mantan ac kini’ kakunivun ciin kabahi’un sala.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，這令我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
